${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Constricting Strike
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:MyCard.NAME: Lil Hit
${modID}:MyCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ConstrictStrike.NAME: Constricting Strike
${modID}:ConstrictStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Gain 2 theconstrictor:Constricting.

${modID}:DustyShiv.NAME: Dusty Shiv
${modID}:DustyShiv.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GoldenWave.NAME: Golden Wave
${modID}:GoldenWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL Gain !B! Block X times.

${modID}:Memory.NAME: Memory
${modID}:Memory.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:ShieldSlammer.NAME: Shield Slammer
${modID}:ShieldSlammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Block. NL

${modID}:Sadistic.NAME: Sadistic
${modID}:Sadistic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they take !M! damage.

${modID}:TreasureChest.NAME: Treasure Chest
${modID}:TreasureChest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BloodBag.NAME: Blood Bag
${modID}:BloodBag.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 HP. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RustyKnife.NAME: Rusty Knife
${modID}:RustyKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, permanently increase this card's damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Chess.NAME: Chess
${modID}:Chess.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw 1 card and gain [E].
${modID}:Chess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw 2 cards and gain [E].

${modID}:SlackTide.NAME: Slack Tide
${modID}:SlackTide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next Attack you play costs 0.

${modID}:SludgeWave.NAME: Sludge Wave
${modID}:SludgeWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FairFight.NAME: Fair Fight
${modID}:FairFight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theconstrictor:Rising_Water. NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your theconstrictor:Rising_Water.

${modID}:Mine.NAME: Mine
${modID}:Mine.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Mine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Flood.NAME: Flood
${modID}:Flood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain theconstrictor:Rising_Water, gain !M! more.

${modID}:ColdShower.NAME: Cold Shower
${modID}:ColdShower.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
${modID}:ColdShower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

${modID}:CoolOff.NAME: Cool Off
${modID}:CoolOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E].

${modID}:ShiningLight.NAME: Shining Light
${modID}:ShiningLight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw !M! cards. NL *Exhaust.

${modID}:EldrichBlast.NAME: Eldritch Blast
${modID}:EldrichBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Hunger.NAME: Hunger
${modID}:Hunger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X Times. NL Exhaust 1 card.

${modID}:Painless.NAME: Painless
${modID}:Painless.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:ClearHead.NAME: Clear Head
${modID}:ClearHead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
${modID}:ClearHead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

${modID}:Envy.NAME: Envy
${modID}:Envy.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 2 theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FadedSeal.NAME: Faded Seal
${modID}:FadedSeal.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Unplayable. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:LoadOff.NAME: Load Off
${modID}:LoadOff.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, lose !M! theconstrictor:Constricting.

${modID}:Headache.NAME: Headache
${modID}:Headache.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is Exhausted, add a *Shining *Light into your hand.
${modID}:Headache.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL If this card is Exhausted, add a *Shining *Light into your hand.

${modID}:StickyPenny.NAME: Sticky Penny
${modID}:StickyPenny.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 Gold. NL If your theconstrictor:Constricting is positive, draw 3 cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:StickyPenny.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Retain. NL Gain 10 Gold. NL If your theconstrictor:Constricting is positive, draw 3 cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Flow.NAME: Flow
${modID}:Flow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your theconstrictor:Constricting is positive, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

${modID}:HideInHelmet.NAME: Hide In Helmet
${modID}:HideInHelmet.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:FroggyMode.NAME: Froggy Mode
${modID}:FroggyMode.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:StrangledStrike.NAME: Strangled Strike
${modID}:StrangledStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The theconstrictor:Absolute_Value of your theconstrictor:Constricting affects this card.

${modID}:EldrichForm.NAME: Eldritch Form
${modID}:EldrichForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an *Eldritch Blast into your hand.
${modID}:EldrichForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add an *Eldritch Blast into your hand.

${modID}:LastGasp.NAME: Last Gasp
${modID}:LastGasp.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LastGasp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Evolution.NAME: Evolution
${modID}:Evolution.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw one additional card.
${modID}:Evolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw one additional card.

${modID}:InfiniteDust.NAME: Infinite Dust
${modID}:InfiniteDust.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Dusty Shiv into your hand.
${modID}:InfiniteDust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Dusty Shiv into your hand. NL Add a *Dusty Shiv into your hand.

${modID}:ShinyFish.NAME: Shiny Fish
${modID}:ShinyFish.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
${modID}:ShinyFish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${modID}:DeadlyGrip.NAME: Deadly Grip
${modID}:DeadlyGrip.DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.
${modID}:DeadlyGrip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 7 theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

${modID}:BigLilHit.NAME: Big Lil Hit
${modID}:BigLilHit.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Lil *Hit into to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BufferedSlam.NAME: Buffered Slam
${modID}:BufferedSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MyCard2.NAME: Muddy Water
${modID}:MyCard2.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theconstrictor:Constricting to EVERYONE. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:EldrichAnger.NAME: Eldritch Anger
${modID}:EldrichAnger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theconstrictor:Constricting to EVERYONE. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Tentacle.NAME: Talk To The Tentacle
${modID}:Tentacle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Stare.NAME: Stare
${modID}:Stare.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has !M! or less HP, set their HP to 0.

${modID}:IntoIt.NAME: Into It
${modID}:IntoIt.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Block. NL If your theconstrictor:Constricting is positive, gain !M! additional Block.

${modID}:ChumInTheWater.NAME: Chum In The Water
${modID}:ChumInTheWater.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theconstrictor:Constricting. NL When the enemy dies, deal damage equal to its max HP to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FishyShield.NAME: Fishy Shield
${modID}:FishyShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Dusty Shiv into your hand.
${modID}:FishyShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Dusty Shivs into your hand.

${modID}:HealAMid.NAME: Stealamid
${modID}:HealAMid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:InkBlast.NAME: Ink Blast
${modID}:InkBlast.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. Draw !M! card.
${modID}:InkBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:AngelFishForm.NAME: Angel Fish Form
${modID}:AngelFishForm.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn is played twice.
${modID}:AngelFishForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first card you play each turn is played twice.

${modID}:FroggyForm.NAME: Froggy Form
${modID}:FroggyForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
${modID}:FroggyForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:ReturnStrike.NAME: Return Strike
${modID}:ReturnStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ReturnStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:BathTime.NAME: Bath Time
${modID}:BathTime.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength and !M! temporary Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AnchorTime.NAME: Anchor Time
${modID}:AnchorTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

${modID}:SmellyFish.NAME: Smelly Fish
${modID}:SmellyFish.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! theconstrictor:Constricting to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SinkingFeeling.NAME: Sinking Feeling
${modID}:SinkingFeeling.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies take damage equal to twice their theconstrictor:Constricting. NL Grave.
